document_data.name: House of Shyrrhr
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Shyrrhr''' was the private residence of [[Piergeiron the Paladinson|Piergeiron's]] illustrous Lady of the Court, [[Shyrrhr]].
document_data.Location: This home was part of a rowhouse that stretched across [[Waterdeep Way]], in the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].

Structure.Interior:
This home was greatly furnished with carpets, lounge cushions, and a round bathing pool. It featured three bedrooms with round, canopied beds, one which had a closet the size of a room. And finally, there was a dining room where Shyrrhr entertained her guests. The pantry featured a secret tunnel that connected the home to [[Piergeiron's Palace]].

The only valuables for [[thieves]] to be find inside this home were a grand selection of fine [[wine]]s, many precious [[gemstone]]s that were roughly worth 20 [[gold piece]]s each, and Shyrrhr's fine [[gown]]s.
